\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 46174}

\subsection*{Almost Death}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{matty}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 50 ug & oral & Pharms - Fentanyl & patch\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 140.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
 \#\#EROWID\_NOTE:UNCONFIRMED\_INJURY\_REPORT\#\# 



I suggest being very careful when doing this. Actually I do not recomend it at all. I got a 50mcg Fentanyl patch. Put it on my toungue,  got the whole dose at once. Got an Extremely nice high. Body\ldots mind\ldotseverything.  



I get to my house\ldots  then the next thing I know paramedics are all around me and my dad is shaking me. Apparently I stopped breathing and was almost dead the EMT said.  Other people had experiences like this one also so I have read.   People   please be carefull  doses of Fentanyl are VERY strong when you put the patch in your mouth. \ldotsfuckin A
